headline.main: U.S. High Court Approves Rule Change to Expand FBI Hacking Power
headline.print_headline: U.S. High Court Approves Rule Change to Expand FBI Hacking Power

docs.snippet: The Supreme Court on Thursday approved a rule change that would let U.S. judges issue search warrants for access to computers located in any jurisdiction despite opposition from civil liberties groups who say it will greatly expand the FBI's hacki...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court on Thursday approved a rule change that would let U.S. judges issue search warrants for access to computers located in any jurisdiction despite opposition from civil liberties groups who say it will greatly expand the FBI's hacking authority.

headline.main: Malta Minister Loses Portfolio Over Panama Papers
headline.print_headline: Malta Minister Loses Portfolio Over Panama Papers

docs.snippet: Maltese Minister Konrad Mizzi has been relieved of his duties in energy and health after he acknowledged opening a company in Panama which is held by a trust in New Zealand....
docs.lead_paragraph: Maltese Minister Konrad Mizzi has been relieved of his duties in energy and health after he acknowledged opening a company in Panama which is held by a trust in New Zealand.

headline.main: Oklahoma Lawmaker Apologizes for Linking Native Americans to Alcoholism
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Lawmaker Apologizes for Linking Native Americans to Alcoholism

docs.snippet: An Oklahoma state legislator has apologized after saying in the legislature last week that Native Americans are pre-disposed to alcohol abuse, officials said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma state legislator has apologized after saying in the legislature last week that Native Americans are pre-disposed to alcohol abuse, officials said on Thursday.

headline.main: Feds, NYC-Area Port Authority Talking Potential Resolution
headline.print_headline: Feds, NYC-Area Port Authority Talking Potential Resolution

docs.snippet: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission and the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey are discussing a "potential resolution" of the regulator's investigation into the agency, bond documents published Thursday show....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission and the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey are discussing a "potential resolution" of the regulator's investigation into the agency, bond documents published Thursday show.

headline.main: Next for Hastert: Prison, Polygraph, Sex-Offender Treatment
headline.print_headline: Next for Hastert: Prison, Polygraph, Sex-Offender Treatment

docs.snippet: Now that a judge branded him "a serial child molester," Dennis Hastert must prepare to serve his 15-month prison sentence. Once he's out, the former House speaker must participate in a sex-offender program that could include lie-detector and other...
docs.lead_paragraph: Now that a judge branded him "a serial child molester," Dennis Hastert must prepare to serve his 15-month prison sentence. Once he's out, the former House speaker must participate in a sex-offender program that could include lie-detector and other tests to determine how many children he's molested in his lifetime.
